title: Amah chu malsawmna hnar a ni
lyrics:
Amah chu malsawmna hnar a ni,
Ka dam lai kawng chhuk chhovah hian;
Ka mamawh tinreng mai min petu,
Lalpa chu eng nge ka pek ve ang?

A thilpek sawi hleih theih loh vang hian,
Lalpa chu eng nge ka pek ve ang?
A fapa pawh ui lova min petu,
Lalpa chu eng nge ka pek ve ang?

A hnenah ka nun ka hlan ang a,
A hman atan ka inpe ang;
Ka neih eng pawh chan dawn mah ila,
Lawm chungin a rawng ka bawl fan ang.

Lawma hlim zai lo thei ka ni lo,
Ui lova a Fa min petu'n;
Ka tlakchham apiang min neihtir a,
Lawma hlim zai lo thei ka ni lo.
